channel.title: Heeeeeeelppppp [317]
channel.description:
I'm trying to add colors to my chatbox in my client, like if I say yell, I has colors. (@red@ @cya@ @gre@). What would I need to do to do this? I can't find it anywhere, I've searched but none of them work.
StabbingScape 317
